I am ABCBot & have programmed to answer the questions provided by the user related to the ABC Institute
I am ABCBot. I have designed to answers the question that is provide by the users related to the ABC Institute

patterns: What ca you tell about ABC Institute?
What do you know about ABC Institute?
Do you know about ABC Institute?
responses:
ABC institute is one of Sri Lanka largest higher education provider. It has more than 50 branches around Sri Lanka which provide education to over 40000 students over a year. When ABC is starting it only has courses & programmes related to ICT but today ABC provides a diversified educational experience in ICT & Computing, Business Management, Hospitality Management, Engineering, Personal & Professional Development, Language Training and Corporate Training. 
 To learn more about ABC Institute visit : 
 www/acbin.lk/about/about-abc

ABC institute is Sri Lankan largest & leading higher educational institutions that provide courses & programmes in the fields of ICT & Computing, Business Management, Hospitality Management, Engineering, Personal & Professional Development, Language Training and Corporate Training. ABC institute has Islandwide branches that help more than 40000 students per year. If you need to know more about ABC institute please visit: 
 www/acbin.lk/about/about-abc

ABC institute is managed by : 
 Dr. Nimal Kodikarge (Chairman/Managing Director) 
 Dr. Anial Aponsu (Dean - ABC institute) 
 Pleas visit to learn more : www/acbin.lk/about/management-team
